content: lh round 3 work as round 1 40 44 48 sts needle round 4 p1 k1 to bor sl bor m bobble the last st and break yarn work round 1-4 2 2 3 times more 48 52 60 sts thumb place the thumb sts on needle a pu and k 3 next work round 1-4 of the dotted sts in the cast on sts knit 14 14 18 sts ssk stockinette pattern repeat 0 1 1 time s k1 k2tog place bor m 16 16 20 sts upper hand knit 2 rounds next you are going to place the sts for your thumb on waste yarn after which you will ribbing continue to work the hand of your mitten next round k1tbl p1 to bor sl bor m next round place the sts until the marker on work the last round 4 times more waste yarn rem m co 3 sts using a backward loop cast on k to bor sl bor m 36 40 44 last round bobble all sts kwise sts finishing next knit 2 rounds weave in all ends and wet-block your mittens next round p1 k1 to bor sl bor m to given measurements m o c next knit 3 rounds s tin k next round p1 k3 to bor sl bor m - k c u r ts ribbing n o o work round 1-12 of the cuff pattern repeat m @ o fn i 4 2 0 2 y b n r o h a js a ta n © k n il 5 abbreviations x y = the brackets represent a repeat directions within m1r / m1pr = make 1 purl right right leaning increase the bracket should be repeated as instructed insert left needle from back to front under the strand of yarn which runs between the next stitch on the left needle approx = approximately and the ast stitch on the right needle knit purl this stitch bef = before through the front loop bobble = bind off p = purl bor = beginning of the round patt = pattern cc = contrast color pm = place marker co = cast on pu = pick up decrease = decrease pwise = purlwise dpn = double pointed needle rem = remove increase d = increase d rh = right hand k = knit rs = right side k2tog / p2tog = knit / purl 2 sts together right leaning sl = slip purlwise with yarn in back on rs and yarn in front decrease on ws unless otherwise stated kwise = knitwise slm = slip marker lh = left hand ssk / ssp = slip slip knit / purl left leaning decrease slip 2 sts as if to k one at a time slip the sts back to the lh m = marker needle knit / purl through back loop m1l / m1pl = make 1 purl left left leaning increase st s = stitch es insert left needle from front
